review: Didn't like the idea of it. Have a cromecast already and was like why do I need two? Cause it's better that's why.
author: Sir Palantir

review: Very nice for watching those free movies on Amazon TV. Netflix and the mobile apps work well too.
author: Robert Dong

review: I have been super happy with my Amazon Fire TV stick. I had previously owned chromecast and was always annoyed at needing to use my phone or computer to control it. The Amazon interface is super easy and could pretty much replace "On demand" for most people. Not only do you get access to free prime content, but also you can buy and watch movies easily on your TV
author: Joshua R

review: After already purchasing a Amazon Fire Tv, my expectations were high. I thoroughly enjoy this "scaled" down version. All the features, less $$. Definitely recommend!
author: Emily T

review: I was one of the first to buy chrome cast.  I was very happy with the app that made my TV in the bedroom a SMART TV. I bought it during BLACK FRIDAY last year for $255.00. This year I got this year I got the Fire TV stick with the relmote and immediately delegated the Chromecast  to the guest room. This has a dedicated remote.
author: musiclover

review: Wish I had gotten a chromecast instead. Firestick constantly freezes on me, is impossible to stream to unless you have a fire hd and is generally clunky. Not worth the $20 I spent on it.
author: Mangofarmer

review: Got this for my mom for xmas since her DVR is always over run with shows she hasnt watched. Took maybe 15 minutes to setup since it had to download and update but after that she was able to easily navigate the device. She was super excited to be able to catch up on a lot of shows with netflix and hulu.
author: Veronica

review: I'm not sure why I didn't get mine until December, since I pre-ordered mine, but I'm very satisfied with the Fire Stick! We took it with us home for the holidays & were able to watch all our faves within minutes!
author: Amazon Customer

review: This device is a complete waste of money. It only connects to the internet sporadically and when it does connect it randomly disconnects in the middle of a program. We've tried it on multiple TV's in different rooms and always the same. We never had this issue with our Apple TV's.
author: L. Harper "L. Harper"
